src.models package¶

Submodules¶

src.models.pipelines module¶

src.models.pipelines.apply_clustering(data: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, model: str, max_df: int = 1, min_df: int = 1, idf: bool = True, max_features: int = None, analyzer: str = 'word', n_gram=(1, 1), **kwargs)¶

This method applies svd data dimension reduction method

Parameters

  • n_gram –

  • analyzer –

  • max_features –

  • idf –

  • min_df –

  • max_df –

  • data – DataFrame

  • model – selected clustering algorithm, :type str [‘k-means’, ‘k-medoids’, ‘dbscan’, ‘ahct’, ‘mean-shift’]

:return model

src.models.pipelines.apply_pca(data: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, n_components: int) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

This method applies pca to given dataset

Parameters

  • data – input dataframe, :type DataFrame

  • n_components – number of result dataframe features,, :type int

:return DataFrame

src.models.pipelines.apply_pca_pipeline(data: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, n_components: int, model: str, max_df: int = 1, min_df: int = 1, idf: bool = True, max_features: int = None, analyzer: str = 'word', n_gram=(1, 1), **kwargs)¶

This method applies pca dimension reduction algorithm to dataset and then clusters data with using selected clustering algorithm

Parameters

  • n_gram –

  • min_df –

  • idf –

  • analyzer –

  • max_features –

  • max_df –

  • data – DataFrame

  • n_components – number of result dataframe features,, :type int

  • model – selected clustering algorithm, :type str [‘k-means’, ‘k-medoids’, ‘dbscan’, ‘ahct’, ‘mean-shift’]

:return model

src.models.pipelines.apply_svd(data: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, n_components: int) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

This method applies truncated svd to in put data with given dimension

Parameters

  • data – input dataframe, :type DataFrame,

  • n_components – Desired dimensionality of output data. , :type int

:return DataFrame
